name: Vektor Storm
overview: Heavy Metal Tempest clone. You are the Commander of a small reconnaissance fleet sent to explore an anomaly in the space time continuum, otherwise known as a Black Hole. By way of an explained equipment malfunction your fleet exits hyperspace too close to the vortex and is drawn into the void. When you emerge from the worm hole, you find yourself in a universe fragmented from your own since the big bang. Everything you knew as truth is now false. Even the very laws of physics have changed. For countless eons, a sole entity has occupied this universe alone, waiting...
